Recipes.title: Easy chicken curry

image.alt: Chicken curry with rice on plate
image.title: Easy chicken curry

Recipes.description: This easy staple chicken curry is a fantastic recipe for family dinners. It's made with just a handful of ingredients and is enriched with creamy yogurt

Recipes.title: Chicken pasta bake

image.alt: Chicken pasta bake served in a casserole dish
image.title: Best ever pasta bake recipes

Recipes.description: Enjoy this gooey cheese and chicken pasta bake for the ultimate weekday family dinner. Serve straight from the dish with a dressed green salad

Recipes.title: Vegetarian lasagne

image.alt: Vegetarian lasagne in a white dish with a white background
image.title: Vegetarian lasagne

Recipes.description: Make our easy vegetable lasagne using just a few ingredients. You can use ready-made tomato sauce and white sauce, or batch cook the sauces and freeze them

Recipes.title: Sausage ragu

image.alt: Sausage ragu served in a casserole dish
image.title: Sausage ragu

Recipes.description: Feed the family this comforting, budget-friendly sausage ragu with pasta. You can freeze the leftovers for another time and it tastes just as good

Recipes.title: Sweet potato & peanut curry

image.alt: Satay sweet potato curry on top of rice in a deep dish
image.title: Satay sweet potato curry

Recipes.description: Cook this tasty, budget-friendly vegan curry for an easy family dinner. With spinach and sweet potato, it boasts two of your five-a-day and it’s under 400 calories

Recipes.title: Chicken and sweet potato traybake

image.alt: Piri-piri chicken with smashed sweet potatoes & broccoli served in a casserole dish
image.title: Piri-piri chicken with smashed sweet potatoes & broccoli

Recipes.description: Serve up an easy one-pan traybake of piri-piri chicken with sweet potatoes and broccoli. As well as being simple to make, it delivers three of your 5-a-day

Recipes.title: American pancakes

image.alt: stack of pancakes with syrup
image.title: stack of pancakes with syrup

Recipes.description: Easy, American-style, fluffy pancakes are great for feeding a crowd at breakfast or brunch. Top with something sweet like fruit, jam or syrup, or rashers of crispy bacon.

Recipes.title: Leek & kale hash with sage fried eggs

image.alt: A serving of leek & kale hash with sage fried eggs
image.title: Leek & kale hash with sage fried eggs

Recipes.description: Make the most of leeks in this veggie hash with fried eggs. A topping of crispy sage leaves really adds to the flavour. Garnish with grated cheese, if you like

Recipes.title: Baby pancakes

image.alt: Plate of baby pancakes, yogurt and berries next to a bowl of berries and platter of pancakes
image.title: Baby pancakes

Recipes.description: Make a batch of mini pancakes to serve for breakfast or celebrate Pancake Day. You can even add fruit if you like, such as apples or blueberries

Recipes.title: Cheese omelette

image.alt: Cheese omelette on a plate with a green salad
image.title: Cheese omelette

Recipes.description: Rustle up a simple omelette for a quick and easy snack any time of day. Use mature cheddar for maximum cheesy flavour

Recipes.title: Eggs Florentine

image.alt: A serving of eggs Florentine
image.title: Eggs Florentine

Recipes.description: Serve up a classic brunch with spinach and poached eggs on soft muffins, topped with creamy hollandaise sauce. The perfect way to start the weekend

Recipes.title: Protein pancakes with banana

image.alt: Two servings of protein pancakes with banana
image.title: Protein pancakes with banana

Recipes.description: Add protein powder to these oat and banana pancakes for a filling breakfast. Serve stacked with a dollop of Greek yogurt, sliced bananas and maple syrup

Recipes.title: Smashed peas on toast

image.alt: Smashed peas on toast with an egg on top
image.title: Smashed peas on toast

Recipes.description: Love avocado on toast? Give this smashed pea version a go – it has the benefit of being kinder to the planet because the produce hasn’t travelled a long way

Recipes.title: Lángos (Hungarian fried bread)

image.alt: Two plates of lángos topped with soured cream and cheese next to a stack of them
image.title: Lángos

Recipes.description: Try these Hungarian deep-fried flatbreads – they're crispy on the outside, soft in the middle, and traditionally topped with soured cream and cheese

Recipes.title: Poached eggs with smoked salmon and bubble & squeak

image.alt: Poached eggs with smoked salmon and bubble & squeak
image.title: Poached eggs with smoked salmon and bubble & squeak

Recipes.description: Create a potato hash with a difference. The addition of cabbage ramps up the texture and nutrition, and swap bacon for leaner fish

Recipes.title: English muffins

image.alt: English muffins on a serving plate
image.title: English muffins

Recipes.description: Serve these traditional English muffins warm, halved and spread with butter, or toasted in a poached egg and hollandaise brunch

Recipes.title: Fried bread

image.alt: Full English breakfast on a plate with fried bread
image.title: Fried bread

Recipes.description: Homemade fried bread is the perfect accompaniment to eggs or a full English fry-up. It's super-simple to make and needs just two ingredients

Recipes.title: Air-fryer fry-up

image.alt: Two plates of air-fryer fry-up
image.title: Air-fryer fry-up

Recipes.description: Make a classic English fry-up using an air-fryer with all the favourites: sausages, bacon, mushrooms, beans and an egg muffin

Recipes.title: Overnight oats

image.alt: Overnight oats served with berries and honey
image.title: Overnight oats

Recipes.description: Adapt this recipe for easy overnight oats to suit your tastes. You can add dried fruit, seeds and nuts, grated apple or pear or chopped tropical fruits for the perfect healthy breakfast

Recipes.title: Spiced carrot & lentil soup

image.alt: Spiced carrot & lentil soup in a bowl
image.title: Spiced carrot and lentil soup

Recipes.description: A delicious, spicy blend packed full of iron and low in fat to boot. It's ready in under half an hour, or can be made in a slow cooker

Recipes.title: Chicken satay salad

image.alt: Chicken satay salad on a plate
image.title: Chicken satay salad

Recipes.description: Try this no-fuss, midweek meal that's high in protein and big on flavour. Marinate chicken breasts, then drizzle with a punchy peanut satay sauce

Recipes.title: Vegan chickpea curry jacket potatoes

image.alt: Vegan chickpea curry jacket potato on a plate with a slice of lemon and fork alongside
image.title: Low-salt lunch recipes

Recipes.description: Get some protein into a vegan diet with this tasty chickpea curry jacket. It's an easy midweek meal, or filling lunch that packs a lot of flavour

Recipes.title: Tomato, pepper & bean one pot

image.alt: Tomato, pepper & bean one pot with our sweet & spicy topping
image.title: Tomato, pepper & bean one pot with our sweet & spicy topping

Recipes.description: Make a batch of this stew at the weekend, then chill or freeze it in portions for easy midweek lunches. See our different toppings to keep it interesting

Recipes.title: Cod with cucumber, avocado & mango salsa salad

image.alt: A plate of cod with cucumber, avocado & mango salsa salad
image.title: A plate of cod with cucumber, avocado & mango salsa salad

Recipes.description: If you're looking for a healthy lunch bursting with the colours and flavours of summer, this delicious cod, avocado and mango salad is low in fat and calories

Recipes.title: Bombay potato frittata

image.alt: Two slices of Bombay potato frittata
image.title: Bombay potato frittata

Recipes.description: Pack in the flavour with this Indian-inspired frittata. Perfect for a healthy lunch, it's low in calories and fat and full of nutrients

Recipes.title: Veggie olive wraps with mustard vinaigrette

image.alt: Veggie olive wraps with mustard vinaigrette
image.title: Veggie olive wraps with mustard vinaigrette

Recipes.description: Eat the rainbow with our simple, healthy, veggie wrap. This olive and veg sandwich makes an easy vegan, low-calorie lunch option to eat al-desko

Recipes.title: Salmon salad with sesame dressing

image.alt: Salad topped with a salmon fillet
image.title: Marathon week meal plan – Wednesday

Recipes.description: Get three of your 5-a-day, plus healthy omega-3 fatty acids, vitamin C, folate and fibre in this quick, easy and low-calorie salad

Recipes.title: Quick chicken hummus bowl

image.alt: Salad bowl with chicken and hummus
image.title: Quick chicken hummus bowl

Recipes.description: Make our healthy chicken and hummus salad bowl for a delicious budget lunch option. It can be thrown together in just 10 minutes and delivers three of your 5-a-day

Recipes.title: Diet cola chicken

image.alt: Diet cola chicken served with rice
image.title: Diet cola chicken

Recipes.description: Use a can of diet cola as a secret ingredient to enhance this chicken casserole. It's an easy and delicious weekday supper, best enjoyed with rice or pasta

Recipes.title: Chicken & tzatziki wraps

image.alt: One chicken & tzatziki wrap
image.title: Chicken & tzatziki wraps

Recipes.description: Pile chunks of chicken with cucumber, tomatoes and tzatziki to make these easy wraps. They're budget friendly and take less than 30 minutes to make

Recipes.title: Pesto spinach penne

image.alt: Pesto spinach penne in bowls
image.title: Pesto spinach penne

Recipes.description: Combine pasta with spinach, pesto and tomatoes for an easy healthy meal. Tomatoes contain vitamin C, which will help your body absorb the iron in the spinach

Recipes.title: Sausage & kale minestrone

image.alt: Sausage & kale minestrone in a large pot and bowl
image.title: Sausage & kale minestrone

Recipes.description: Use whatever small pasta shape is your favourite for this comforting bowl of minestrone soup – just amend the cooking time according to pack instructions

Recipes.title: Spicy tofu tahini noodle salad

image.alt: Spicy noodle salad
image.title: Spicy noodle salad

Recipes.description: Whip up this easy noodle salad. With minimal cooking involved, it helps on the energy usage front. Switch up the veg depending on what’s in season

Recipes.title: Smoky chickpea salad

image.alt: One serving of peach, mozzarella & chicken panzanella
image.title: Peach, mozzarella & chicken panzanella

Recipes.description: Enjoy the layers of flavour and contrast of textures in this vegan salad, with crisp, fried chickpeas, crunchy raw broccoli, and a smoked paprika dressing

Recipes.title: Spicy bean & avocado quesadillas

image.alt: Several spicy bean & avocado quesadillas on a plate
image.title: Spicy bean & avocado quesadillas

Recipes.description: Enjoy a Mexican-inspired lunch that’s packed with flavour. As well as being quick to make, these are healthy, low in calories, plus three of your 5-a-day
